title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, March 11, 2020
description: On this day in 1918, the first cases of the influenza pandemic were reported in the U.S. when 107 soldiers got sick at Fort Riley, Kansas.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1918, the first cases of the influenza pandemic were reported in the U.S. when 107 soldiers got sick at Fort Riley, Kansas.
